content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Answer (a), (b), and (c). a) Describe one change in European family structures in the period 1900 to 2000. b) Describe one continuity in European family structures in the period 1900 to 2000. c) Explain one effect of a change in European family structures in the period 1900 to 2000.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
